allowNegative.description: Determines whether negative values are allowed, true by default
allowNegative.description_zh: 确定是否允许使用负值，默认情况下为 true

decimalScale.description: Limits the number of digits that are displayed after the decimal point, by default there is no limit
decimalScale.description_zh: 限制小数点后显示的位数，默认情况下没有限制

decimalSeparator.description: Character used as a decimal separator, '.' by default
decimalSeparator.description_zh: 用作小数分隔符的字符，默认为 '.'

fixedDecimalScale.description: If set, 0s are added after decimalSeparator to match given decimalScale. false by default
fixedDecimalScale.description_zh: 如果设置，则在 decimalSeparator 后添加 0 以匹配给定的 decimalScale。false 默认

thousandSeparator.description: A character used to separate thousands, ',' by default
thousandSeparator.description_zh: 用于分隔千位的字符，默认为 '，'
